title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 23 - Protection In Construction, Demolition And Excavation Operations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 23 - Protection In Construction, Demolition And Excavation Operations

State Regulations

Subpart 23-1 - General Provisions (§ 23-1.1 to 23-1.34)

Subpart 23-2 - Construction Operations (§ 23-2.1 to 23-2.8)

Subpart 23-3 - Demolition Operations (§ 23-3.1 to 23-3.4)

Subpart 23-4 - Excavation Operations (§ 23-4.1 to 23-4.5)

Subpart 23-5 - Scaffolding (§ 23-5.1 to 23-5.22)

Subpart 23-6 - Material Hoisting (§ 23-6.1 to 23-6.3)

Subpart 23-7 - Personnel Hoists (§ 23-7.1 to 23-7.3)

Subpart 23-8 - Mobile Cranes, Tower Cranes And Derricks (§ 23-8.1 to 23-8.5)

Subpart 23-9 - Power-operated Equipment (§ 23-9.1 to 23-9.11)

Subpart 23-10 - Exhaust Gases From Internal Combustion Engines (§ 23-10.1 to 23-10.7)

Subpart 23-11 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 23

Statutory authority: Labor Law, §§21, 27, 27-a, 29; General Business Law, §483

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
